name: reaparr
description: Reaparr is a self-hosted automation dashboard for managing Pirate streaming tools like Sonarr and Radarr. It features status overviews, control tools, and link management.
features: Unified dashboard: Monitor status and health of Sonarr, Radarr, and related services from one interface.
Quick controls: Start, stop, or restart services without accessing individual application interfaces.
Status monitoring: View real-time health checks, disk space, and system resource usage.
Link management: Organize and access all your media automation tools through a centralized hub.
Activity feed: See recent downloads, imports, and system events across all connected services.
Search integration: Query multiple indexers and services simultaneously from a single search box.
Calendar aggregation: View upcoming releases from both Sonarr and Radarr in one unified calendar.
Queue management: Monitor and control download queues across all connected clients.
Custom widgets: Add or remove dashboard components to show the information most relevant to you.
Mobile optimized: Access your automation dashboard from phones and tablets with responsive design.
Theme customization: Switch between light and dark modes or create custom color schemes.
API connectivity: Connect to existing Sonarr and Radarr instances using their native APIs.
